questions: What is the process for configuring and setting up resources?
How to create an account at http://www.fullcontact.com/?
How to generate an API key?
How to copy the token to Tracardi form?
answer:
# Resource configuration and set-up
1. Create account at http://www.fullcontact.com/
2. Log-in to the account
3. Select API Keys from the left menu
4. Click Generate New Key
5. Copy the token to Tracardi form. It is only showed once. 
6. Save the Tracardi form
